QuestData.Title: Emerald Sisters
QuestData.Description:
The owlbeasts here are disconnected from Elune.
A contingent of dryads went into their territory to find out what went wrong, but none of them have returned.
I fear the worst, and I believe they are in need of rescue.
While I try to learn if the owlkin can be saved, I would appreciate your help in freeing any Sisters you find in the grotto.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue $1oa Sisters of the Moon in Lostlight Grotto.
QuestData.RewardText: The owlbeasts are... melting the dryads down and using their bones to create minions?! How... how could this even be?
